UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Antibacterial activity of synthetic peptides derived from lactoferricin against Escherichia coli ATCC 25922 and Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212.
Literature.Author: León-Calvijo MA, Leal-Castro AL, Almanzar-Reina GA, Rosas-Pérez JE, García-Castañeda JE, Rivera-Monroy ZJ

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=116.3µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MBC=116.3µM),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=58.2µM),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MBC=116.3µM)
